snippet.title: The Long Way Home [Dev-log 1] Introduction
snippet.description:
In this first Devlog, we give you an introduction to the game and introduce you to our team.

The Long Way Home is a story-based indie game created by NiftyLlamaGames.
NiftyLlamaGames is a game Development group of volunteers creating their first Indie Game.

Songs used:
David Hyde https://soundcloud.com/davidhydemusic/acousticfolk-instrumental-mumford-sons-inspired-free-download
Koethe Koethe https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vDbvDfUZ7wM

Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/niftyllamagames
Discord:https://discord.gg/73Dpray
Email: niftyllamagames@gmail.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/NiftyLlamaGames
